ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter use found
ygData.msgSnippet: ! !!! !!!!!! Thats it?  Thats what the famed Gemcutter is used for? An SK quest???  Gnomes cant even be SK s, hehhee Im glad I am a retired Tinkerer. Thanks
ygData.messageBody:
!
!!!
!!!!!!
Thats it? Thats what the famed Gemcutter is used for?
An SK quest??? Gnomes cant even be SK's, hehhee

Im glad I am a retired Tinkerer.

Thanks for the info and grats to whom ever made the dicovery.

----- Original Message -----
From: Whistler <breeze2327@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 01, 2001 6:06 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter use found


> Since the discovery of the Gem Cutter gnomes have
> wondered its uses.
>
> The gemcutter can be used in place of the Darfumpel
> part of the shadow night quest containing a faceted
> Hyacinth as a quest componet.
>
> Take one gemcutter and one uncut hyacinth and put into
> a jewelry bag. Have a high-level jeweler combine these
> items and you receive the faceted Hyacinth.
>
> Darfumple (npc) charges 1000pp to facet the stone so
> using this, shadow nights could probably get it done
> cheaper from pc sources. This is the only quest I know
> of that it works on but it is surely compatible with
> other stones...
>
> __________________________________________________
